title: Did Ronald Reagan warn of "magneticism " and wish to declare a commercial war against American friends?
subtitle: In a 1988 radio address, President Reagan stood up against those who demanded trade tariffs and mocked protectionism as "a cheap form of nationalism."
author: David Emery
vclaim: President Reagan warned the public against the Mogs who had called for a trade war against America ' s friendly trading partners in the name of protectionism.
